pullrequest.title: Added documentation for test coverage, and a section for internal developers.

content.raw: The job history has a fixed length and then gets deleted. I personally get emails for all these results, so I can look back there to see if there were any failing tests, but maybe we can think of a more persistent archive for the summary of each job?
content.html: The job history has a fixed length and then gets deleted. I personally get emails for all these results, so I can look back there to see if there were any failing tests, but maybe we can think of a more persistent archive for the summary of each job?
